program.name: Basic Beginner Routine
program.author: /r/fitness
program.description:
This is a great starting routine for complete beginners.

It's simple, easy to follow routine, which will introduce you to weight lifting.

You should run it for ~3 months, and then switch to some other routine, like '5/3/1 for beginners'.

exercises.name: Bent Over Row
Bench Press
Squat
Overhead Press
Deadlift

program.name: Dumbbell P/P/L
program.author: /u/gregariousHermit
program.description:
This is a great starting routine for beginners if you only have dumbbells available. If you have a barbell, then your better bet is 'Basic Beginner Routine'.

It's a Push/Pull/Legs routine with linear progressing, each day is focused on either Push, Pull or Legs.

You'll need a bench, adjustable dumbbells and a pull-up bar.

exercises.name: Bench Press
Incline Chest Fly
Arnold Press
Triceps Extension
Bent Over Row
Lateral Raise
Shrug
Bicep Curl
Goblet Squat
Lunge
Single Leg Deadlift
Standing Calf Raise

program.name: GZCLP
program.author: Cody LeFever
program.description: Popular linear progression workout routine, based on the GZCL method, featuring well-balanced exercise selection, and proven progression scheme. It's great for beginners, you could choose it right after 3-month course of 'Basic Beginner' program.

exercises.name: Tier 1 Squat
Tier 1 Deadlift
Tier 1 Bench Press
Tier 1 Overhead Press
Tier 2 Deadlift
Tier 2 Squat
Tier 2 Bench Press
Tier 2 Overhead Press
Lat Pulldown
Bent Over Row

program.name: Starting Strength Phase 1
program.author: Mark Rippetoe
program.description: Great absolute beginner program from a famous trainer and powerlifter Mark Rippetoe. One of the most popular starting weightlifting routines.

exercises.name: Squat
Bench Press
Overhead Press
Deadlift

program.name: Texas Method
program.author: Mark Rippetoe
program.description: A good program for intermediate lifters from the famous Mark Rippetoe. A good choice when you can't progress anymore adding weight each workout - here you add weight weekly.

exercises.name: Squat
Bench Press
Deadlift
exercises.finishDayExpr: state.fiverm = state.fiverm + state.increment

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
Back Extension
Overhead Press
Power Clean

program.name: 5/3/1 For Beginners
program.author: Jim Wendler
program.description:
A very popular weight lifting routine - 5/3/1 by Jim Wendler, adapted for beginners.

Good both for strength and size, it's well tested by time and helped thousands of lifters to achieve their goals

exercises.name: Squat
Deadlift
Bench Press
Overhead Press
Pull Up
Skullcrusher
Bicep Curl
